title: Fun Champions
body:
I'm looking for a new champion to play. I generally like mechically interesting champions however that isn't a requirement. I have an aggressive, playmaking playstyle. I'm a jungle main, however I play any every role often. Finally, don't be afraid to recomment champions that aren't the traditional "fun" champions (like zed, Darius, stuff like that). I enjoy tanks, supports, and underplayed champions as much as the common ones. Also I don't really care if th champion is all that good at the moment

If it helps, my 5 highest master champions are:
Gragas (by a LOT)
Lee Sin
Azir
Braum
Nidalee

Thanks for any suggestions!
